title: Rate equals 0
report_sql:
SELECT created_at,
	increment_id as `Order`,
	order_currency_code,
	store_currency_code,
	base_currency_code,
	global_currency_code,
	base_to_global_rate,
	base_to_order_rate,
	store_to_base_rate,
	store_to_order_rate
FROM @sales_flat_order
WHERE base_to_global_rate=0
  OR base_to_order_rate=0
  OR store_to_base_rate=0
  OR store_to_order_rate=0
ORDER BY created_at

atributes.reportDescription: Alert conversion rates between currencies equal to 0.
